summary: Defines a suite of unit tests for the TensorFlow Vision Transformer model, verifying its configuration, forward‑pass signature, handling of embedded inputs, execution in graph mode, core model attributes, and ability to load pretrained weights, while adapting generic tests to ViT’s unique input expectations.
business_intent: Ensure the TF ViT implementation works correctly and reliably for image classification, supports TensorFlow graph execution, and can be instantiated from pretrained checkpoints.
